group_1.textLeft: I know a good way to solve all our problems...!

group_1.textRight: ... Speak away.

group_1.textLeft: We need to prove Alina's kindness...!

group_1.textRight: ... Anyone else have any other ideas?

group_1.textLeft: Eh...?!@At least hear me out...

group_1.textRight: I'm not interested in Alina's kindness or whatever.
Alina just does what she wants.

group_1.textLeft: But see...
If Alina said something kind to Karin...
Karin would be so happy she might go *pop*!
... Out of thin air, perhaps...?
And then, maybe she'll sleep right away...!
If that happens, we can kill two birds with one@stone...!
You think it's possible~...?

group_1.textRight: Hotaru, shh!
Alina was not able to do it earlier, right?
It's probably going to end up as "not heartfelt" or something anyway.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...
Maybe it's because those weren't Alina's honest@feelings,
that the message didn't get across...
I was too involved in it... I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: ......[wait:0.8][chara:111202:lipSynch_1] And?

group_1.textLeft: Alina, tell her how you feel.
With your own words.

group_1.textRight: Alina can only think of bad words to describe her.
Is that fine with you?

group_1.textLeft: ... Uh, please keep it nice a little...?

group_1.textRight: Nothing, then.

group_1.textLeft: B-But...@You're always in the club room together, right...?
Even though you're in different clubs,
Karin said that you gave her advice on manga.
At the time, Karin thought it was amazing.
The times where she treated you kindly, is there@nothing at all...?
You're kidding...@Nothing at all...?

group_1.textRight: Alina's memory was lost.@How many times do I have to say it again?

group_1.textLeft: But... She was together with you in the hospital...@After your memory loss...
You've been with her the longest... Haven't you...?

group_1.textRight: Hearing "memory loss" from you kind of irritates@Alina...

group_1.textLeft: Eeh~... Cruel...

group_1.textRight: There, there...@Keep going, good girl.

group_1.textLeft: Mmh... Don't treat me like...@Well, whatever...
Eehh... What is it...
You and Karin have known each other the longest@after your amnesia... Hm...

group_1.textRight: Right, right.

group_1.textLeft: Then... There must be at least one, riightt...?
For me, I was sleeping in the libraary...@And before I knew it, it was way past tiimee...
When I was trapped... She came to pick me upp...

group_1.textRight: What a Hotaru thing to do...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
I was looking for my lost mechanical pencil one@time.
Then she told me that "It's in your hand"...!

group_1.textRight: No way... Are all high schoolers like this...?
Alina'd love it if we weren't clumped together.
But, I did get one idea from this.
It was the day Alina first came back to school@after she lost her memory.
She told me where Alina used to do club activities.

group_1.textLeft: ... And you were grateful to her for that?

group_1.textRight: That's the only thing Alina can think to thank@the fool girl for.

group_1.textLeft: I think even that is fine...!
Let's tell Karin how much you appreciate her with@a loud voice!

group_1.textRight: ... Why loud?

group_1.textLeft: Well...!
We need to say loud, heartfelt words of gratitude...!
If we say it quietly... It might not reach her ears...

group_1.textRight: ......@[wait:0.8][chara:111202:lipSynch_1:eyeClose_1] *Breathes*...
THANK YOU FOR TELLING ALINA WHERE TO DO@CLUB ACTIVITIES!!
... No response.

group_1.textLeft: No good, huh...
